features: Customize your experience with the three different modes: Clean, White and Gum Care.
Pressure sensor protects teeth and gums from excess brushing pressure while improving your gum health up to 100% more vs a manual toothbrush.
Always know when to replace your brush head for an effective clean with BrushSync replacement reminder.
2 minute timer with QuadPacer helps ensure dental professional recommended brushing time and encourages brushing in each quadrant of the mouth.

Battery indicator light let's you know when to recharge; 2 week battery life. Includes: 1 Philips Sonicare 5300 handle, 1 charger, 1 G2 Optimal Gum Care brush head, 1 travel case, 2 extra W DiamondClean brush heads
Subscribe & Save on genuine Philips Sonicare brush head replacements and save up to 15%.
body.description: Improve your gum health up to 100% better than a manual toothbrush with the ProtectiveClean 5300 rechargeable electric toothbrush. It has a pressure sensor that protects teeth and gums from excess brushing pressure. Customize your own brushing experience with your choice of 3 modes: Clean, White and Gum Care. Our BrushSync technology tracks how long you have been using your Optimal Gum Care brush head and how hard you have been brushing. Your electric toothbrush will beep to inform you when to replace your brush head. The easy-start feature slowly increases the power of the brush as you get used to the Sonicare experience and the SmarTimer encourages a full 2 minute brushing time as recommended by your dental professional. The battery indicator light lets you know when it is time recharge; 2 week battery life. The kit includes 1 ProtectiveClean 5300 handle, 1 Optimal Gum Care brush head, 1 charger, 1 travel case, and 2 extra DiamondClean brush heads. Subscribe & Save on genuine Philips Sonicare brush head replacements and save up to 15%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic electric toothbrush! Great cleaning action at a great price. I feel like I've been to the dentist office for a cleaning every time I use this brush. I really like timer function that prompts me to move from quadrant to quadrant and brush for two minutes. Brush pauses and emits a beep every 30 seconds and shuts off automatically after two minutes in the CLEAN setting. Two and a half minutes for the WHITENING setting and three minutes for the GUMS setting. Haven't tried the latter two settings but I assume they have the same feel, just longer durations.Brush comes with a charging stand, but I've only charged it once initially and have been using it twice a day for a week without having to recharge. Mine also came with two extra brush heads.The sonic action is a little disconcerting at first and it sort of tickles if a touch the roof of my mouth with the brush. Can be a little messy if you don't keep your mouth closed around the brush as much as possible. And you will drool a little when brushing for two minutes.Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Good quality and battery charge lasts. Very happy with my bright smile. Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my teeth have never felt cleaner
reviews.reviewText: battery life lasts pretty well, so you don't even have to leave it sitting on the charger with the cord taking up counter space. it comes with a really cool case for travel which I appreciate and I love that it buzzes to let you know when 30 seconds has passed, so I can spend 30 seconds per quadrant. I really do mean it when I say my teeth have never felt cleaner. idk how it truly works, but it gets all the gunk off for sure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and it does the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s fairly quiet and fits well in the hand
reviews.reviewText: Once I decided on Sonicare, spent a while comparing models to get the most bang for my buck. I went with the 5300 with 3 heads, in part due to the days between charging. At home, it sits on the charger anyway, but if I travel, don’t want to bring the base. And really- if the battery stops working when I’m out of town- not the end of the world, can still use it to manually brush.The head was small anticipated, but I’m liking it. The travel case is huge and unnecessary. I already have a couple toiletry kits and the brush fits in those. Try as I might, I never get to 2 minutes, but I am brushing longer than I was previously. The only weakness, in my opinion is that it stutters or pauses if I press too hard. Okay, so I try not to do that, but never had that issue with disposable electric brushes.I encourage you to also compare all their models before making a purchase. One more thing, it came with an unexpected coupon- if I registered, they’d send me a free head. The form was incompatible with this model number.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have had this toothbrush for 2 weeks and I love it. Charging base on unit is small and compact compared to past models that I have had. This one is easy to pack and travel with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Caliber Quality!
reviews.reviewText: So glad I invested in this toothbrush. The weight of it feels so comfortable. It charges quickly. The bristles feel soft and pleasant on your teeth. The vibration lowers when it detects your gums. The three different modes are great when pairing with specific toothpastes. What else? Hmm, idk! My teeth and gums feel so much healthier after using it for a while now. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great brushes and last soooo long without charging
reviews.reviewText: These are great! Would buy again in the future. Battery lasts forever and feel clean and fresh after each use.
I've been using Sonicare toothbrushes for years. No cavities so far. Also helps with gum health. Won't even consider another brand. Bought this when my previous model's battery died.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buena opción para cambiar el cepillo tradicional
reviews.reviewText: Este cepillo es una muy buena opción para cambiar tu cepillo tradicional, ya que disminuye la velocidad si estás cepillando muy fuerte, evita que lastimes y te sangren las encías, tiene un medidor de tiempo que te indica cuando cambiar de cuadrante y el cepillo hace todo, tú solo tienes que deslizarlo por la superficie de tus dientes, yo lo estoy usando para ortodoncia y el cepillado es muy fácil.

reviews.reviewTitle: バッテリー寿命がとても短い。
reviews.reviewText: バッテリー寿命2週間とありますが、実質1週間も持ちません。サポートに問い合わせても一向に返信なし。最悪です。
makes my teeth feel clean and white

reviews.reviewTitle: I bought both and came back to this one.
reviews.reviewText: I like this Phillips tooth brush, tried to replace my old one and couldn’t find it. So I bought the other brand. I think it does a better job than the round one. I like how it brushes your teeth, and the little sound it makes when charging I found the bathroom outlets always a bit iffy.My teeth were getting in bad shape, from using the “other” it really hurt to brush them, bleeding gums, which I’ve never had in my life, they hurt so much I was swishing my mouth out without brushing.My gums have cleared up my teeth don’t hurt I think the round one a bit rough on my gums and I have always gone to the dentist regularly.I’ll stick with my Phillips.
